metaDescricao: Portfolio of Mateus Galvão, data engineer and data scientist.

header.role: Data Engineer | Data Scientist | Data Architect
header.name: I am Mateus Galvão

sobre_descricao: I am a computer enthusiast who seeks to explore the processing capacity of machines in extracting useful information from large masses of data.
experiencias_descricao: Big Data Professor, certified in Data Analysis and Data Engineer with postgraduate degree.
portfolio_descricao: Check out some of my Data Science projects.
servicos_descricao: I offer complete data analysis solutions for your business:
contato_descricao: Talk to me! It will be an honor to help you.

analise_descritiva.descricao: Transformation of raw data into visual insights through dynamic dashboards, allowing a clear understanding of the current performance of your business.

analise_diagnostica.descricao: Identification of root causes behind business results, allowing understanding the "why" of trends and patterns in your data.

machine_learning.descricao: Development of predictive models to anticipate trends, behaviors and results, supporting strategic decisions based on data.

engenharia_dados.descricao: Construction of robust pipelines for extraction, transformation and loading (ETL) of data, ensuring reliable and up-to-date information.

treinamento.descricao: Training teams in data analysis tools (Python, Power BI, Excel) and consulting for implementation of data-driven culture.

arquitetura_dados.descricao: Development of efficient data models, designing scalable structures that optimize the storage and retrieval of information.

analise_vendas.descricao: Interactive dashboard for sales analysis using Power BI. Includes segmentation by period, products and regions, with visual insights for decision making.
analise_vendas.descricao_longa: This project was developed to provide a comprehensive view of a retail company's sales performance, using Power BI as the main tool. Through the integration of multiple data sources, it was possible to create a complete analytical environment to support decision making.
analise_vendas.relatorio:
Project Objective

Create an interactive dashboard that would allow the management team to analyze sales trends, identify high-performing products and areas with growth potential.

Methodology

  • Extraction of data from multiple sources (SQL Server, Excel and APIs)
  • Cleaning and transformation using Power Query
  • Dimensional modeling in star schema format
  • Creation of DAX measures for important KPIs
  • Design of interactive visualizations

Results

The dashboard provided insights that led to a 15% increase in sales through the identification of opportunities in specific regions and optimization of the product mix. Data-driven decision making resulted in reduced inventory and increased profit margin.
analise_vendas.alt: Sales dashboard created in Power BI showing charts of revenue, products and regions

previsao_casas.descricao: Machine learning model to predict house prices with Python. Uses regression, exploratory analysis and cross-validation.
previsao_casas.descricao_longa: This data science project applies advanced machine learning techniques to predict residential real estate prices. Using the famous Boston Housing dataset and other real estate data sources, I developed a predictive model capable of estimating prices based on various property characteristics.
previsao_casas.relatorio:
Project Objective

Develop a predictive model capable of accurately estimating the value of residential properties, helping investors and buyers in decision making.

Methodology

  • Detailed exploratory analysis to understand the factors that influence prices
  • Treatment of missing data and outliers
  • Feature engineering to create more predictive variables
  • Testing multiple algorithms: Linear Regression, Random Forest, Gradient Boosting
  • Hyperparameter optimization via GridSearch
  • Cross-validation to ensure model robustness

Results

The final model (Gradient Boosting) achieved an R² of 0.91 and an RMSE of only 4.3% of the average property value. Feature importance analysis revealed that location, size, and age are the most determinant factors for price.
previsao_casas.alt: Scatter plot of house prices predicted by machine learning model

dashboard_rh.descricao: Visualization of HR indicators in a dynamic dashboard. Allows analysis of turnover, absenteeism and employee satisfaction.
dashboard_rh.descricao_longa: This dashboard was developed for the Human Resources department of a large company, aiming to provide a complete view of the main people management indicators. The project integrates data from different internal systems to create a single point of access to relevant information.
dashboard_rh.relatorio:
Project Objective

Create an interactive tool that would allow the HR department to track key people management metrics, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions.

Methodology

  • Requirements gathering with the Human Resources team
  • Identification and access to necessary data sources (payroll system, climate surveys, time records)
  • Creation of integrated data model
  • Development of specific HR KPIs
  • Implementation of interactive visualizations and filters

Results

The dashboard enabled a 25% reduction in turnover rate after identifying critical satisfaction factors by department. The tool also allowed for more efficient monitoring of absenteeism, resulting in an estimated annual savings of R$ 120 thousand with the implementation of specific policies.
dashboard_rh.alt: HR dashboard with turnover, absenteeism and employee satisfaction indicators

dashboard_rh2.descricao: Advanced version of the HR dashboard with additional indicators and predictive analysis of employee turnover.
dashboard_rh2.descricao_longa: This enhanced version of the HR dashboard incorporates predictive analysis techniques to identify turnover risk factors and elements that contribute to employee satisfaction. The project uses Python integrated with Power BI to implement machine learning models.
dashboard_rh2.relatorio:
Project Objective

Expand the capabilities of the original HR dashboard with advanced and predictive analytics capabilities, allowing not only to monitor indicators but also to predict trends and simulate scenarios.

Methodology

  • Integration of Python with Power BI for advanced analytical capabilities
  • Implementation of predictive model to identify turnover risk
  • Development of sentiment analysis for comments in climate surveys
  • Creation of simulators for salary increase scenarios and cost impact
  • Implementation of automatic alerts for deviations in key indicators

Results

The predictive turnover system demonstrated 78% accuracy in identifying employees at high risk of departure in the next 3 months. Preventive actions implemented based on these analyses resulted in an estimated savings of R$ 350 thousand in recruitment and training costs in the first year.
dashboard_rh2.alt: Advanced HR dashboard with turnover prediction indicators

previsao_casas2.descricao: Extension of the machine learning model for the commercial real estate market, with specific factors for location and zoning.
previsao_casas2.descricao_longa: This project extends predictive analysis to the commercial property segment, incorporating specific variables such as zoning, occupancy rate of the region, business profile of the surroundings, and appreciation potential based on urban infrastructure projects.
previsao_casas2.relatorio:
Project Objective

Develop a machine learning model specialized in predicting commercial property values, considering the particularities of this segment of the real estate market.

Methodology

  • Collection and integration of data from multiple sources, including transaction records, zoning data, and geospatial information
  • Implementation of spatial analysis techniques to assess the impact of location
  • Development of specific features for commercial properties (pedestrian flow, proximity to shopping centers)
  • Use of neural networks with TensorFlow for advanced modeling
  • Implementation of geospatial visualizations for results analysis

Results

The model achieved an R² of 0.89 for commercial value prediction, with an absolute mean percentage error (MAPE) of 6.2%. The system correctly identified areas with appreciation potential based on new urban infrastructure projects.
previsao_casas2.alt: Scatter plot of commercial real estate prices predicted by machine learning model

dashboard_rh3.descricao: Specific dashboard for engagement survey analysis, with metrics for satisfaction, productivity, and retention.
dashboard_rh3.descricao_longa: This project focused specifically on the analysis of employee engagement and satisfaction, integrating data from organizational climate surveys, performance evaluations, and productivity indicators to identify correlations and critical success factors.
dashboard_rh3.relatorio:
Project Objective

Create an analytical solution to deeply understand the factors that affect employee engagement and their impact on business results.

Methodology

  • Structuring climate surveys with validated psychometric methodologies
  • Implementation of advanced statistical techniques using R integrated with Power BI
  • Development of composite indices for engagement and satisfaction
  • Correlation analysis between engagement and performance indicators
  • Implementation of interactive visualizations by department, seniority, and demographic profile

Results

The analyses revealed a strong correlation (r=0.72) between the engagement index and team productivity. Initiatives implemented based on the insights obtained resulted in an 18% improvement in the engagement index in 6 months, with a direct impact of 8% on overall productivity.
dashboard_rh3.alt: Employee engagement dashboard with satisfaction and productivity indicators

texto.voltar_para_a_seo_de_portflio: Voltar para a seção de portfólio

paragrafo.atuo_na_rea_de_cincia_de_dados:
Atuo na área de Ciência de Dados, em constante formação e desenvolvimento, com experiência
                            prática em políticas de vendas, estratégias de precificação e operações de varejo. Ao longo
                            da minha trajetória, venho aplicando uma abordagem analítica voltada para resultados, unindo
                            visão de mercado com habilidades técnicas em Python, SQL, R, Power BI e ferramentas de
                            análise em nuvem.
paragrafo.gosto_de_conectar_dados_e_estr:
Gosto de conectar dados e estratégia. Com base em fundamentos sólidos de estatística,
                            modelagem e visualização de dados, trabalho para transformar grandes volumes de informação
                            em insights acionáveis que apoiam decisões mais precisas e eficazes.
paragrafo.meu_foco_est_em_desenvolver_so:
Meu foco está em desenvolver soluções que aliem o raciocínio técnico à realidade dos
                            negócios, sempre buscando gerar impacto real por meio da inteligência de dados.
paragrafo.acredito_que_grandes_solues_na:
Acredito que grandes soluções nascem de quem combina
                                profundidade e visão ampla. Por isso sigo o conceito T-Shaped: mergulho a fundo no que
                                estudo e amplio meus horizontes para enxergar conexões que geram impacto de verdade.
paragrafo.especializao_em_anlise_avanada:
Especialização em análise avançada de dados,
                                        modelagem estatística e implementação de algoritmos de machine learning para
                                        solução de problemas de negócios.
paragrafo.formao_em_engenharia_com_foco_:
Formação em engenharia com foco em desenvolvimento
                                        de sistemas computacionais, análise de algoritmos e processamento de dados em
                                        larga escala.
paragrafo.curso_tcnico_com_nfase_em_prog:
Curso técnico com ênfase em programação, manutenção
                                        de hardware e administração de redes de computadores.
paragrafo.especializao_em_gesto_de_dados:
Especialização em gestão de dados corporativos,
                                        estratégias de Business Intelligence e análise de mercado para tomada de
                                        decisões.
paragrafo.imerso_intensiva_em_cincia_de_:
Imersão intensiva em ciência de dados com projetos
                                        práticos utilizando Python, Pandas, NumPy e técnicas avançadas de visualização
                                        com bibliotecas como Matplotlib e Seaborn.
paragrafo.curso_especializado_em_consult:
Curso especializado em consultas SQL avançadas,
                                        otimização de queries e manipulação eficiente de grandes conjuntos de dados em
                                        ambientes corporativos.
paragrafo.certificao_em_desenvolvimento_:
Certificação em desenvolvimento de dashboards
                                        interativos, modelagem de dados e implementação de métricas de negócios
                                        utilizando Microsoft Power BI.
paragrafo.treinamento_completo_em_algori:
Treinamento completo em algoritmos de aprendizado
                                        de máquina, desde regressão e classificação até redes neurais e processamento de
                                        linguagem natural.
paragrafo.certificao_em_conceitos_fundam:
Certificação em conceitos fundamentais de
                                        computação em nuvem na Amazon Web Services, incluindo implementação de serviços
                                        de dados e analytics.
paragrafo.curso_prtico_sobre_containeriz:
Curso prático sobre containerização de aplicações e
                                        orquestração de serviços para ambientes de dados escaláveis e distribuídos.
paragrafo.curso_especializado_em_desenvo:
Curso especializado em desenvolvimento de pipelines
                                        de dados, ETL e processamento de big data com ferramentas Python como Apache
                                        Airflow e Spark.
paragrafo.especializao_em_redes_neurais_:
Especialização em redes neurais profundas, modelos
                                        de visão computacional e sistemas de processamento de linguagem natural usando
                                        TensorFlow e PyTorch.
